name: 極悪BL
summary:
Collection of Stories:
1. Flower Trash (花の芥) by KIRISHIKI Tokico
2. Roses and Sludge (薔薇とヘドロ) by TENKAWA Ai
3. Karman (カルマ) by INUGAMI Sukekiyo
4. Sex Price Ticket (セックスプライスチケット) by NANABISHI Hiro
5. The Joy of Living (生きる歓び) by kayama
6. My Favorite Bad Guy (極道の推しメン) by MIZUI Ama
7. Cold Floor by TADA Kise
8. The Novelist's Way of Loving (小説家の愛し方) by ASAI Sai
9. The Saint's Footprints (聖者の足跡) by Aga Naomi & MATSUYOSHI Aco

Cover by KIRISHIKI Tokico
info:
• 作者: 桐式トキコ、松吉アコ
  • 出版社: 三交社
  • 价格: ￥ 1,020

  • 页数: 224
